Header.Title: Max To Go
Header.MovingabModal: MovingAB – Your Trusted Staffing Partner in Moving, Cleaning, and Transportation Across Sweden With nearly 1,000 qualified consultants available nationwide, MovingAB is a leading staffing firm specializing in the moving, cleaning, and transportation industries. We provide flexible and reliable solutions for companies needing extra workforce, wherever you are in Sweden. Through MovingAB, you can easily scale up your team without managing multiple partnerships. Simply contact us, and we’ll handle the staffing, ensuring the right personnel is in place for every assignment. For long-distance moves, there’s no need to send your entire team – just send your driver, and MovingAB’s experienced personnel will be ready to assist at both the loading location (Point A) and unloading location (Point B). This allows you to optimize your resources and ensure smooth operations. Learn more about how MovingAB can support your business with professional and flexible staffing by clicking the link here.

footer.AboutUsInfo: Welcome to the Smart Path to Future Collaboration and Growth
footer.SubscribeInfo: Get the latest updates via email. you may unsubscribe Any time

Hero.info: Welcome to the Smart Path to Future Collaboration and Growth

title.0: Welcome to the Smart Path to Future Collaboration and Growth

description.0: Reach partners across the EU at no cost with just a few clicks.
description.1: We are a digital platform that connects moving, transport, and service companies to enable efficient collaboration, smart growth, and sustainable development.
description.2: A platform for task sharing that unites moving, transport, and service companies across Sweden and EU countries.
description.3: We contribute to sustainability by reducing the number of vehicles on the road through coordinated sharing of transport and service tasks between companies.

whyWe.title1Info: Connect to a digital platform with all your partners
whyWe.title2Info: Fill your schedule efficiently with assignments
whyWe.title3Info: Contribute to reduced environmental impact through ride-sharing and resource-sharing

About.AboutInfo: Max To Go is a digital platform that connects moving, transport, and service companies across Sweden and the EU. We streamline booking and task sharing within transport and logistics to maximize efficiency and customer comfort. By coordinating transport assignments, we help companies manage operations and ensure safe transport, creating smoother workflows and optimizing resources. In doing so, we also make a positive contribution to sustainability by reducing the number of vehicles on the road.
About.welcome: Welcome to the Smart Path to Future Collaboration and Growth
About.mainDescription: Transforming relocations into seamless experiences with professional expertise and dedication
About.intro: Max To Go is an innovative platform connecting companies in the transport, moving, construction, and other service industries to streamline operations and create smart, sustainable solutions. Through Max To Go, companies can not only sell and buy assignments from one another but also optimize resources, reduce empty trips, and unlock new business opportunities.

collaboration.title: Examples of Collaboration: Moving and Transport Companies
collaboration.description: In the moving and transport industry, empty trips are common—when a vehicle returns without cargo after a delivery or move. Max To Go allows moving and transport companies to sell these empty trips to other businesses that need transportation from the same area.

benefits.title: Max To Go – Benefits for All Industries
benefits.costs: Reduced Costs: Companies avoid unnecessary empty trips, saving fuel and time.
benefits.revenue: Increased Revenue: By selling empty trips, companies can fill their vehicles on return journeys and generate additional income.
benefits.utilization: Better Resource Utilization: By coordinating trips between companies, vehicle capacity is maximized for every transport.
benefits.reduced: Reduced Empty Trips: By buying and selling empty trips from other companies, transporters can make full use of each journey.
benefits.maximized: Maximized Revenue: Companies can sell extra assignments and purchase assignments from others to fill schedules.
benefits.improved: Improved Cross-Industry Collaboration: Max To Go provides a platform where companies from various sectors can connect.
benefits.sustainable: Sustainable Growth: By optimizing trips and reducing empty journeys, we contribute to a more sustainable future.

industries.title: Examples of Collaboration in Other Industries

construction.title: Construction and Transport Companies
construction.description: Construction companies can easily book material transport from various suppliers directly through the app, coordinating multiple deliveries along the same route.

service.title: Service Companies
service.description: Companies in sectors like plumbing, electrical work, and cleaning can use Max To Go to coordinate their services with moving and transport companies.

retail.title: Retail and Logistics
retail.description: Stores and warehouses can use Max To Go to sell their transport needs to local transport companies, enabling faster and more cost-effective deliveries.

About.closing: Max To Go is the future platform for companies in transport, moving, construction, and other service industries that aim to collaborate smarter and grow sustainably.

Services.ServicesIntro: Discover our comprehensive range of services designed to streamline your logistics and moving needs
Services.Service1: Sell and Buy Moving and Logistics Tasks
Services.Service1Info: Connect with other moving companies and transport businesses to sell and buy assignments. Whether you offer moving services or logistics solutions, you can easily transfer tasks and maximize your business opportunities.
Services.Service2Info: Maximize your resource utilization by selling your empty trips between cities or countries. Use our platform to easily register available runs and connect with other transport companies that need to transport goods in the same direction. This contributes to sustainability by reducing the number of empty vehicles on the roads.
Services.Service3Info: Offer your services in moving cleaning, facility maintenance, and other service areas. By using our platform, companies can easily buy and sell services, creating an efficient and secure workflow.
Services.Service4Info: Need to temporarily store goods? Our platform enables the buying and selling of storage services, making it easier for businesses to manage their resources and inventory.
Services.Service5Info: Take advantage of Trip sharing opportunities with other businesses. By collaborating, you can share transportation costs and optimize your logistics, improving operational management and enhancing customer comfort.
Services.Service6Info: Do you have a truck available on a certain day? Register your vehicle on our platform so that other companies can book it for their transportation needs. This creates a flexible and safe transport solution for everyone involved.

HowItWorks.title: This is how Max To Go works, via our app or website:

step1.title: You have a task to sell
step1.description: If you have a task, for example in the moving or another industry, that you cannot take on or want to sell to others, you can easily do so through Max To Go, either via our app or website.

step2.title: Log in and describe the task
step2.description: Log in via our app or website, describe the task in detail (e.g., a move from one location to another, delivery of construction materials, or a service), and publish it. The more information you provide, the clearer it will be for potential buyers.

step3.title: Other companies see your task
step3.description: All companies using Max To Go, whether via the app or website, will see the task in their feed. They can either buy the task directly or place bids if you choose to accept offers.

step4.title: Choose a buyer
step4.description: Once several companies have shown interest, you can choose the one you think is best suited to take on the task – either based on price, experience, or reviews from previous collaborations.

step5.title: Evaluate the buyer
step5.description: After the task is completed, you can evaluate the buyer and their service. This helps other companies on the platform make informed decisions about whom to collaborate with in the future.

HowItWorks.closing: Max To Go, through both the app and the website, makes it easy for companies to collaborate, sell and buy tasks, and contribute to a smooth and efficient workflow.

Contact.ContactInfo: Add your information to contact you as soon as possible

IndividualTasks.SubmitTaskAsIndividual: Get a quote as a private individual completely free of charge.

FAQs.title: FAQs for Max To Go
FAQs.a1: Max To Go is a digital platform that connects transport, moving, and service companies to streamline operations and facilitate collaboration.
FAQs.q2: How does Max To Go work?
FAQs.a2: Users can register, post tasks, and either buy or sell services such as transport, moving, and logistics through the platform.
FAQs.q3: Who can use Max To Go?
FAQs.a3: Any company in the transport, moving, or service industry can register and use the platform.
FAQs.q4: How do I create an account?
FAQs.a4: You can create an account by visiting our website and following the registration process, which involves providing some basic information about your company.
FAQs.q5: Is there a fee to use Max To Go?
FAQs.a5: Registration is free, but there may be fees associated with specific transactions or services on the platform.
FAQs.q6: How do I post a task?
FAQs.a6: Once you're logged in, navigate to the task posting section, provide detailed information about the task, and submit it for other users to see.
FAQs.q7: Can I sell my empty trips?
FAQs.a7: Yes, you can list your empty trips on the platform for other companies to purchase, maximizing your vehicle's utilization.
FAQs.q8: How can I find other companies to collaborate with?
FAQs.a8: You can browse the platform to find companies that offer services complementary to your own and contact them directly through the app.
FAQs.q9: What types of tasks can I post?
FAQs.a9: You can post tasks related to transport, moving, logistics, and even service jobs like cleaning and maintenance.
FAQs.q10: How do payments work on Max To Go?
FAQs.a10: Payments are arranged directly between the buyer and seller outside of the app; Max To Go does not handle transactions.
FAQs.q11: What if I have a problem with a task or a company?
FAQs.a11: You can contact us at info@movinggomax.com for assistance with any issues or disputes.
FAQs.q12: Is my data safe with Max To Go?
FAQs.a12: Yes, we comply with GDPR regulations and take the necessary steps to protect your personal and company data.
FAQs.q13: How does Max To Go contribute to sustainability?
FAQs.a13: By facilitating collaboration and resource sharing, Max To Go helps reduce empty trips, which minimizes fuel consumption and environmental impact.
FAQs.q14: Can I use the platform for international tasks?
FAQs.a14: Yes, Max To Go allows for connections not just within Sweden but also across EU countries.
FAQs.q15: What types of companies can benefit from Max To Go?
FAQs.a15: Transport companies, moving firms, construction companies, and service providers can all benefit from increased collaboration and efficiency.
FAQs.q16: How do I remove a posted task?
FAQs.a16: To remove a task, simply contact us at info@movinggomax.com, and we will assist you in deleting it from the platform.
FAQs.q17: Are there any restrictions on who I can sell tasks to?
FAQs.a17: No, you can sell tasks to any registered user on the platform as long as they meet the requirements for the service you're offering.
FAQs.q18: What happens if a company doesn't fulfill a task?
FAQs.a18: We recommend addressing the issue directly with the company involved, but you can also report it to us for further review.
FAQs.q19: Can I access Max To Go from my mobile device?
FAQs.a19: Yes, Max To Go is designed to be accessible from both desktop and mobile devices for your convenience.
FAQs.q20: How do I contact Max To Go for support?
FAQs.a20: You can reach us via email at info@movinggomax.com for any inquiries or support requests.

GuestTasks.MovingTextareaPlaceholder: Describe your needs in detail, such as the number of furniture items, moving boxes, goods, or other important information, to ensure you receive the right assistance.
GuestTasks.CleaningImages: Please upload images for the kitchen and bathrooms to get the right price
GuestTasks.MovingDescription: Through our Max To Go platform, you gain access to a network of over 100 reliable and professional moving and cleaning companies. By submitting your request, we match it with the most qualified companies, ensuring the highest quality at the best price for your moving project.
GuestTasks.WarehousingDescription: Max To Go also offers storage services for when you need to store your furniture or other items in a safe and accessible way. Our network of trusted storage providers makes it easy for you to find a location that suits your needs, whether you require short-term or long-term storage. Through our platform, you can quickly book storage at competitive prices and feel confident that your belongings are in good hands. We offer flexible solutions for both private and business customers, ensuring your items are stored in secure, well-maintained, and climate-controlled spaces.
GuestTasks.CleaningDescription: Moving Cleaning, Home Cleaning, Office Cleaning, and Window Washing Max To Go also offers a range of cleaning services, including moving cleaning, home cleaning, office cleaning, and window washing. Through our platform, you can easily request these services from a network of trusted, professional cleaning companies. Whether you're preparing for a move, need a deep cleaning at home, or require regular maintenance for your office, we ensure that you get top-quality service at competitive prices. Our partners are vetted and experienced, so you can rely on us for efficient, thorough, and eco-friendly cleaning solutions.
GuestTasks.EmptyCarDescription: With Max To Go, private customers can easily take advantage of shared moving and transport services. If you have only a few items to move and want to avoid high costs, shared transport is an ideal option! We track available space on moving trucks across the country, allowing us to offer competitive prices by combining your move or transport needs with other similar jobs. Our partners are qualified moving and transport companies, ensuring a safe, cost-effective, and sustainable solution, while also reducing empty trips and optimizing resource use.

Terms.title: Terms of Use for Max To Go

terms.title: Terms for Using Max To Go

content.1: By using Max To Go, you agree to the current terms of use.
Max To Go is a platform that connects transport, moving, and service companies to streamline logistics, transport, and booking tasks.
content.2: By registering and describing tasks on Max To Go, companies can buy and sell services such as transport, moving, and logistics, as well as manage available resources to maximize capacity.
content.3: When a task is published, other companies within the network can buy or place a bid, enabling a secure and efficient transfer of tasks.
content.4: Max To Go will send an email confirmation for each completed task transaction. Contact is made directly between the user and the purchasing company.
content.5: If users wish to remove a request or a published task from the platform, they can contact us at: info@movinggomax.com.

content.1: Misrepresenting an association with Max To Go or our partners, either publicly or privately, is prohibited.
content.2: Unauthorized access to non-public parts of the platform or information from other users is not allowed.
content.3: Max To Go must not be used to distribute malicious code or to gather hidden information from other users.
content.4: Users must not interfere with other users' ability to use the platform.
content.5: Impersonating another person or entity is prohibited.
content.6: If there is suspected misuse of the platform, Max To Go reserves the right to suspend the account.

content.1: Max To Go facilitates contact between users and providers and is not involved in the execution or content of the agreements made between parties.
content.2: Transport companies, moving companies, and service companies on Max To Go are independent, and we do not guarantee that all providers will contact users with offers.
content.3: The use of Max To Go is at the user's own risk, and Max To Go is not responsible for the execution or quality of agreements. However, we only work with reliable and reputable companies.
content.4: Max To Go partners with selected independent companies but does not guarantee that the offers are the best or cheapest on the market.
content.5: Max To Go is not responsible for force majeure events such as natural disasters, strikes, import restrictions, or other unforeseen events impacting our platform.
content.6: Max To Go is not responsible for any taxes or fees related to the use of the platform.

content.1: All intellectual property rights related to Max To Go belong to Max To Go and may not be used commercially without written permission.
All communication with Max To Go is conducted electronically via info@movinggomax.com.
Max To Go complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), and collected data is used solely for the purpose of connecting relevant transport and service companies.
Max To Go reserves the right to change the terms of use without prior notice. Continued use implies acceptance of the new terms.
content.2: The date of the latest update is shown at the top of this document.

content.1: Use of Max To Go and any disputes are subject to Swedish law.
content.2: Disputes should primarily be resolved directly between the parties but may be taken to court if necessary.

ramavtal.title: Brokerage Agreement for Moving Go Max
ramavtal.lastUpdated: Between Moving Go Max AB, Org.nr: 559394-8085 and the 'Performer'

content.1: Moving Go Max offers a digital platform where companies in transport, logistics, moving, cleaning, and other service industries can collaborate by mediating assignments and sharing resources. Moving Go Max acts as an intermediary between companies offering and seeking services, without owning or selling the assignments themselves. A service fee in the form of a percentage of the assignment value is charged for each assignment mediated via the platform.

The broker is entitled to a brokerage fee per assignment, which may be a percentage fee based on the value of the assignment or a fixed fee, depending on the nature of the assignment or as agreed with the Client. The fee is to be paid directly to the Broker as soon as an assignment is published or purchased by an assignee. Certain exceptions may apply for larger assignments, empty runs, or shared runs.

Contact information between parties will be displayed only after an assignment has been purchased. Before payment, it is prohibited to share contact information in the comment field or chat. Moving Go Max checks all assignments to ensure these rules are followed before publication. If any party violates this clause by sharing contact information in advance, they may be immediately deregistered from the platform and fined.

Broker's Responsibility Moving Go Max provides a platform for collaboration and acts solely as an intermediary between clients and partners. Moving Go Max is not responsible for executing or completing assignments and has no control over the quality, safety, or execution of the assignment.
content.2: Client's Responsibility The client is responsible for providing accurate and complete information about each assignment. Any incorrect, incomplete, or misleading information is the responsibility of the client.
content.3: Forwarding of Assignments Moving Go Max is responsible for forwarding assignments by publishing them on the platform, where other partners can see and purchase the assignments. However, Moving Go Max does not guarantee that all assignments will be sold or matched.
content.4: Partner's Responsibility Each partner is responsible for having the necessary permits, such as traffic permits and insurance, and for handling any additional costs that may arise during the execution of the assignment.
content.5: Limited Liability Moving Go Max cannot be held responsible for delays, failures, or any damages that occur during an assignment. It is the responsibility of the client and the partner to secure and execute the assignment in a professional and legal manner.
content.6: Dispute Resolution Any disputes between the client and the partner that arise in connection with the assignment should be resolved between the parties themselves. Moving Go Max can assist with contact information but has no obligation to mediate or resolve disputes.
content.7: Exceptions for Large Assignments and Empty Runs Brokerage fees and payment terms may vary for large assignments, empty runs, or shared runs. Special conditions may apply, and these must be approved by all parties before the assignment begins.
content.8: Confidentiality and Information Security Moving Go Max is committed to handling users' information confidentially and in accordance with applicable legislation. Partners and clients are also expected to comply with GDPR and other relevant data protection regulations.
content.9: Validity of the Agreement This agreement is valid from the date of signing and until further notice, unless a specific period has been specified in the agreement. The agreement can be terminated with immediate effect in the event of serious breaches of the terms.

content.1: To promote high quality and reliability in all assignments, companies will be able to evaluate each other after each completed assignment. Through this system, it is ensured that both clients and partners strive to maintain the highest possible standard in execution and professionalism. These evaluations also contribute to a safer and more transparent working environment for all users on the Moving Go Max platform.

The assignee undertakes to deliver the service described in this document at each given time in accordance with the agreement. The agreement applies only between the Client and the Assignee. Agreements or arrangements between the Client and the Assignee are prohibited and entail a penalty as described below.

The assignee must follow the specified assignments and is responsible for ensuring that the service is performed according to the agreed quality and within the agreed timeframe. The assignee must use their own vehicles, materials, and personnel. In the event of failure to meet these requirements, the agreement may be terminated immediately.

All orders are binding according to the agreement. The assignee must immediately inform the Client if they cannot perform the service. Orders must always be made through the Moving Go Max platform, and violations of this clause entail a penalty.

The client has the right to cancel assignments in the event of force majeure or similar circumstances. If the assignment is canceled by the client close to execution, compensation shall be paid to the assignee according to the following compensation model:

Assignee's Cancellation The assignee may not cancel an assignment within 48 hours before the planned execution. If cancellation occurs earlier than 48 hours before the start of the assignment, the assignee is obliged to pay a cancellation fee corresponding to 25% of the total assignment value to the broker.
content.2: Client's Cancellation If the client cancels an assignment less than 24 hours before the scheduled execution, compensation of 10% of the total assignment value is paid to the assignee.

content.1: The assignee has the right to invoice the Client after 2 days with 30 days payment terms. Payment must be made no later than 20 days after receiving the invoice, which must be specified according to the assignment.
content.2: Moving Go Max will eventually act as a payment mediator to facilitate transactions between clients and assignees. In this system, the client pays the value of the assignment to Moving Go Max at the start of the assignment. After the assignment has been completed and approved by the client, Moving Go Max transfers the payment to the assignee.

content.1: The assignee is responsible for the service for two (2) years from delivery to the Client according to the Consumer Services Act. If remedial measures are needed, these must be carried out within 24 hours to receive full compensation.

13.title: Payment Delay and Late Payment Interest

content.1: In the event of non-payment, the assignee is entitled to statutory late payment interest.
A fixed compensation based on the type of service to be performed, regardless of whether the assignment is completed or canceled.
A percentage of the total agreed amount for the assignment, where the percentage is determined in advance and based on how close the cancellation occurs in relation to the agreed service.
Compensation for documented costs incurred by the assignee up to the cancellation, which may include labor costs, material costs, or other direct expenses related to the assignment.

Moving Go Max reserves the right to perform quality checks on services performed by the assignee. The assignee is obliged to cooperate with Moving Go Max in these checks and take necessary measures to address any deficiencies.
Any changes to the agreement or the services to be performed must be approved in writing by both the Client and the Assignee. Changes may lead to adjustments in schedules and costs.

Moving Go Max is not responsible for any damages or losses that may arise as a result of the assignee's performance of the services, unless such damages are due to gross negligence or intentional misconduct by Moving Go Max.

1. Lifetime Commitment By accepting these terms, both clients and partners commit to Moving Go Max for an unlimited period, without a specific binding period. This means a lifetime commitment to only use Moving Go Max for the mediation of assignments within similar services.
content.2: 2. Exclusivity Clause Clients and partners commit not to use competing digital mediation platforms for similar services. This applies only to collaborations between companies, and not private customers, B2B platforms.
content.3: 3. Sanctions for Violation In the event of a breach of the exclusivity clause, Moving Go Max may, after assessment, impose a sanction fee of 100,000 SEK. Moving Go Max reserves the right to take further action, including termination of membership and other legal actions.
content.4: 4. Adaptation and Updating Moving Go Max may update the agreement in the event of major market changes or legislation to protect the platform's exclusivity and competitiveness.
content.5: 5. During the validity of the agreement, the Client commits to only assign their moving assignments to the Broker. The Client may not enter into agreements or otherwise transfer assignments to other brokers, moving companies, transport, cleaning, or other service companies without written approval from the Broker.

content.1: 1. Requirement for Permits and Insurance Partners are required to have all necessary traffic permits and relevant insurance according to applicable legislation to be able to perform moving assignments legally and safely.
content.2: 2. Insurance Responsibility It is the partner's responsibility to ensure the validity of and bear the costs for all required insurance, including liability insurance, transport insurance, and other necessary insurance for the execution of the assignments.
content.3: 3. Responsibility for Extra Costs Partners are responsible for costs related to permits and other necessary expenses that may arise during the execution of purchased assignments, including fees for specific permits or additional insurance needs.

content.1: The assignee has the right to request compensation for extra costs if it turns out that the assignment requires more time or resources than originally stated. This is especially true if the assignee discovers that the information provided by the broker or the client does not match reality, for example in terms of volume (cubic meters), weight, number of items, or other conditions for the transport. Additional costs must be specified and explained to the client before the additional work begins.

Protection of Confidential Information The parties commit not to disclose confidential information about each other, partners, or information related to private customers to third parties without prior written approval from the other party.
content.2: Handling of Customer Information All information about private customers, including personal data and other sensitive data, must be handled in accordance with applicable data protection legislation (GDPR). Partners commit to taking all necessary measures to protect such information from unauthorized access, loss, or dissemination.
content.3: Limitation of Use Confidential information may only be used to fulfill the obligations arising from this agreement. The use of customer data or information about partners for other purposes is strictly prohibited and may lead to a breach of contract.

24.title: Evaluation and Adjustment of the Agreement

content.1: The agreement and the prices for the brokerage fee can be evaluated and adjusted as needed. Evaluations can be made continuously, and adjustments can be made at any time to ensure that the agreement remains relevant and fair to all parties.
1. Data Processing: The parties commit to following GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) and applicable data protection laws when handling personal data related to this Agreement.
content.2: 2. Data Controller: The client is the data controller for personal data shared with the Broker in connection with moving assignments. The broker acts as a data processor and processes personal data only according to instructions from the client.
content.3: 3. Consent and Information: The client is responsible for obtaining the necessary consent from registered individuals and providing them with information on how their personal data is processed.
content.4: 4. Security: The broker must take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data against accidental or unlawful destruction, loss, alteration, unauthorized dissemination, or access.
content.5: 5. Incident Reporting: The assignee must immediately inform the client and the broker of any personal data incidents and cooperate to manage and report such incidents to supervisory authorities and registered individuals as required by law.

content.1: Disputes arising in connection with this Agreement shall primarily be resolved through negotiations between the parties. If an agreement cannot be reached, the dispute shall be settled in a Swedish court applying Swedish law.

AboutS.Introduction: MovingGo Max is a revolutionary platform that unites companies in transport, moving, construction, and other service industries under one roof. Our app is designed to promote collaboration between companies, streamline their operations, and create smart, sustainable solutions for growth.
AboutS.CollaborationIntro: Through MovingGo Max, companies from different industries can easily interact, sell tasks to each other, and optimize their resources – all via a centralized and user-friendly platform.

Benefits.Title: Benefits of MovingGo Max:
Benefits.Point1: Maximum efficiency: By coordinating services and selling tasks to each other, companies can reduce empty trips, increase productivity, and maximize their resources.
Benefits.Point2: Cross-industry collaboration: MovingGo Max enables companies from different sectors to connect and collaborate in ways that weren't previously possible.
Benefits.Point3: Sustainable growth: By reducing the number of vehicles on the roads and optimizing resource usage, companies can grow sustainably while contributing to a greener future.

HowItWorks.Title: This is how MovingGo Max works, via our app or website:
HowItWorks.Step1: You have a task to sell: If you have a task, for example in the moving industry or any other industry, that you cannot take on or want to sell forward, you can easily do so through MovingGo Max, either via our app or website.
HowItWorks.Step2: Log in and describe the task: Log in via our app or website, describe the task in detail (e.g., moving from one location to another, delivery of construction materials, or a service), and publish it. The more information you provide, the clearer it becomes for potential buyers.
HowItWorks.Step3: Other companies see your task: All companies using MovingGo Max, via the app or website, receive the task in their feed. They can either buy the task directly or place bids if you choose to accept offers.
HowItWorks.Step4: Choose a buyer: When several companies have shown interest, you can choose the company you think is best suited to take over the task – either based on price, experience, or reviews from previous collaborations.
HowItWorks.Step5: Evaluate the buyer: When the task is complete, you can evaluate the buyer and their service. This way, you help other companies on the platform make well-informed decisions about who they want to collaborate with in the future.

Sustainable.Title: Max To Go Sustainable
Sustainable.Preview: How Our Concept Contributes to Sustainability: Reduced empty trips, More Efficient Resource Use, Support for Small and Start-up Businesses, Decreased Traffic Congestion, Greener Business Models, Carbon Emission Reduction.
Sustainable.ContributionTitle: How Our Concept Contributes to Sustainability:
Sustainable.ReducedEmptyRunsDescription: By connecting companies, we minimize trips without loads, directly cutting unnecessary emissions and saving fuel.
Sustainable.EfficientResourceUseDescription: Businesses can easily coordinate routes and share tasks, leading to optimal vehicle use and fewer vehicles on the road.
Sustainable.SupportForSmallBusinesses: Support for Small and Start-up Businesses
Sustainable.SupportForSmallBusinessesDescription: We help small businesses grow sustainably by providing access to more local jobs, reducing their need for long-distance trips and fuel consumption.
Sustainable.DecreasedTrafficCongestionDescription: Fewer empty vehicles mean less traffic, contributing to increased road safety and reduced wear and tear on infrastructure.
Sustainable.GreenerBusinessModelsDescription: The platform equips companies with better tools to track sustainable practices, enabling effective monitoring and reduction of environmental impact.
Sustainable.CarbonEmissionReductionDescription: By avoiding excessive vehicle use, emissions are lowered, creating a positive environmental impact over time.
Sustainable.ContributionDescription: Our concept is designed to make the transport and moving industries more sustainable, efficient, and collaboration-driven. We recognize that one of the biggest logistics challenges is the long distances vehicles travel empty. Through our platform, we minimize the need for empty trips, which positively impacts the environment and reduces traffic congestion. This is achieved by creating a collaborative platform that connects moving and transport companies nationwide. Businesses can seamlessly book, coordinate routes, and hand off tasks to other companies within the network – all to maximize each trip and eliminate unnecessary empty trips. For moving and transport companies, this means no more sending vehicles far distances only to return empty. Instead, they can quickly find nearby partners to take on tasks. This enables transport services to flow naturally, with businesses sharing jobs and optimizing routes together. As a result, time and fuel are saved, leading to lower carbon emissions and less road wear. For small and startup companies, this is a chance to maximize capacity and grow sustainably. By joining our network, they gain access to more jobs and can fill their schedules without the need for marketing or long trips. Beyond route optimization, our platform helps companies avoid excessive vehicle usage, reducing emissions and lowering maintenance needs. Supporting sustainable business practices and offering companies tools to prevent unnecessary trips also decreases the overall environmental impact of the transport industry. The platform makes it easier to monitor and follow sustainable practices, giving businesses greater control over emissions. We see ourselves as a reliable partner for companies that want to grow without compromising the environment. By bringing together small and large companies on a single platform where tasks are visible and fairly distributed, we contribute to a greener and more efficient future for the moving and transport industries. Together, we can reduce our ecological footprint and build a society where smart transportation benefits businesses, the environment, and society as a whole.
